metadata.title: CVE-2022-24773 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Forge (also called `node-forge`) is a native implementation of TransportLayer Security in JavaScript. Prior to version 1.3.0, RSA PKCS#1 v1.5signature verification code does not properly check `DigestInfo` for aproper ASN.1 structure. This can lead to successful verification withsignatures that contain invalid structures but a valid digest. The issuehas been addressed in `node-forge` version 1.3.0. There are currently noknown workarounds.

criterions.comment: node-node-forge package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
